ext_description.message: Open the active tab or a link in a incognito window via toolbar button, context-menu or keyboard shortcut.

action_open_tab_in_incognito.description: Action message for open tab in incognito.

command_open_page_in_incognito.description: Command message for open tab in incognito.

context_menu_open_page_in_incognito.description: Context menu message for open page in incognito.

context_menu_open_link_in_incognito.description: Context menu message for open link in incognito.

context_menu_open_selection_in_incognito.description: Context menu message for open selection in incognito.
